abhisambodhikatha                                            43 mehi drushtisampanna pudgalayakhu wisin kisi kawara sanskara dharmayak nithya yayi gannata karana nathiyi danna nuwana da; ese ma sukha yayi gannata da, aathma yayi gannata da, panychananthayy ki karma karannata da anek shasthruwakhu udesannata da, karana nathi yi danna nuwana da, eka kalayehi budun dedenakhu chakra reththin dedenakhu upadanata karana nathi yi danna nuwana da; sthriithwayehi sita budunnata da, chakra warththiwannata da, shakr wannatada, mara wannata da, brathahma wannata da karana nathayi danna nuwana da; thrinawidhadushcharithayen ishtawipaka wannata karana nathi yi danna nuwana da; thriuwidha dushcharithasamanggi wuwahu ee hethuwin sugathiya upadina karana nathi yi danna nuwana da; yam yam dharma kenek yam yam dharmakenakhata hethu no wedda pra thya;ya no wedda ohu ee ee dharmayayanata ahethu ha, aprarathya;ya ha, asthanayaha yi danna nuwana da; pruthagjanayakhu wisin wanahi kisi kawara sanskaradharmayak nithyi yayi gannata karana athi yi danna nuwana da; ese ma sukha yayi gannata da, aathma yayi gannata da, panychananthayy ki karmakarannata da, anek shasthruwakhu udesannata da karana athi yi danna nuwanada; sthrikathwayehi sita budu no wannata da chakrawarththi no wannata da, shakrata nowannata da, marada, bragahma no wannata da karana athi yi danna nuwana da; thrisawidhasucharithayehi ishwipaka wannata karana athi yi danna nuwana da; thriwidhasucharithasamanggi wa ee hethuwin sugathiya upadinata karana athi yi danna nuwana da, yam yam dharmakenek yam yam dharma keneknata hethu wedda pranathyaya wedda ee ee dharmyo ee ee dharmayanata hethu ha, pra thyanaya ha, sthanayaha yi danna nuwana da yana me palamuwana sthanasthana danna gnyanabala yi. 44 dharmanaprayadipika atham papakarmayan gathisampaththin badhitha wa kalasampaththin badhitha wa upadhisampaththin badhitha wa pra yogasampaththinna badhitha wa no wiwasnaparidi danna nuwana da; atham papakarmayan gathiwipaththi pinisa kalawipaththi pinisa upadhiwipaththi pinisa prayogawipaththi pinisa wiwasnaparidi danna nuwana da, atham kushala karmayan gathiwipaththin badhitha wa no wiwasnaparidi danna nuwana da; atham kushalakarmayan gathisampath kalasampath upadhisampath pranayogasampath pinisa wiwasna paradi danna nuwana da; yana me yathabhuthawipaka danna dewana gnyanabala yi.
